headline: Cloudflare DDoS threat report 2022 Q3
keywords: DDoS, Cloudflare Radar, DDoS Reports, Insights, Trends
description: In Q3, DDoS attacks increased by 111% YoY, Cloudflare auto-mitigated a 2.5 Tbps attack targeting a Minecraft server as multi-terabit scale DDoS attacks become increasingly frequent. Read more in our 2022 Q3 DDoS Report
